content: the written pattern in its entirety along with the photos are for personal use only all property rights belong to maya kuzman of the little treasures supplies yarn and hook ～50 gr of sport yarn of your choice and a 4 mm hook uk 8 /us 6 other scissors and tapestry needle for weaving ends stitches in us terminology stitch st skip skip chain chain double_crochet double_crochet double_crochet 2 together decrease gauge 3 double_crochet in 2 cm / 0 78 measurements 100cm/39 3 in length 7cm / 2 75 at the widest point note ch3 at the end/beginning of next row counts as a stitch
